mapper.sql: id, day, num, num_w, num_q, num_b, num_s, num_g, is_wqb, is_wqs, is_wqg, is_wbs, is_wbg, is_qbs, is_qbg, is_bsg, is_wsg, is_qsg,bsg_type, wx_type, create_time
mapper.select:
select
from xjssc_open_data where day like "%"#{ID}"%"
mapper.insert: insert into xjssc_open_data (id, day, num, num_w, num_q, num_b, num_s, num_g, is_wqb, is_wqs, is_wqg, is_wbs, is_wbg, is_qbs, is_qbg, is_bsg, is_wsg, is_qsg,bsg_type, wx_type, create_time ) values (#{ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DAY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numW,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numQ,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numB,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numS,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numG,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isWqb,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isWqs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isWqg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isWbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isWbg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isQbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isQbg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isBsg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isWsg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bsgType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wxType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{isQsg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into xjssc_open_data
id,
day,
num,
num_w,
num_q,
num_b,
num_s,
num_g,
is_wqb,
is_wqs,
is_wqg,
is_wbs,
is_wbg,
is_qbs,
is_qbg,
is_bsg,
is_wsg,
is_qsg,
create_time,
#{ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{DAY,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{numW,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{numQ,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{numB,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update xjssc_open_data
day = #{DAY,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num_w = #{numW,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_q = #{numQ,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_b = #{numB,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_s = #{numS,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_g = #{numG,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_wqb = #{isWqb,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_wqs = #{isWqs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_wqg = #{isWqg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_wbs = #{isWbs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_wbg = #{isWbg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_qbs = #{isQbs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_qbg = #{isQbg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_bsg = #{isBsg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_wsg = #{isWsg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_qsg = #{isQsg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bsg_type = #{bsgType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wx_type = #{wxType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update xjssc_open_data set day = #{DAY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num_w = #{numW,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num_q = #{numQ,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num_b = #{numB,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num_s = #{numS,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num_g = #{numG,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_wqb = #{isWqb,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_wqs = #{isWqs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_wqg = #{isWqg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_wbs = #{isWbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_wbg = #{isWbg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_qbs = #{isQbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_qbg = #{isQbg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_bsg = #{isBsg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_wsg = #{isWsg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_qsg = #{isQsg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bsg_type = #{bsgType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wx_type = #{wxType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.day,b.is_wqb,b.is_wqs,b.is_wqg,b.is_wbs,b.is_wbg,b.is_wsg,b.is_qbs,b.is_qbg,b.is_qsg,b.is_bsg from cqssc_day a left join (select substr(day,1,8) day,sum(if(is_wqb=2,1,0)) is_wqb,sum(if(is_wqs=2,1,0)) is_wqs,sum(if(is_wqg=2,1,0)) is_wqg, sum(if(is_wbs=2,1,0)) is_wbs,sum(if(is_wbg=2,1,0)) is_wbg,sum(if(is_wsg=2,1,0)) is_wsg,sum(if(is_qbs=2,1,0)) is_qbs,sum(if(is_qbg=2,1,0)) is_qbg,sum(if(is_qsg=2,1,0)) is_qsg, sum(if(is_bsg=2,1,0)) is_bsg,sum(IF(wx_type = 3, 1, 0)) wx_type,sum(IF(wx_type = 4, 1, 0)) bsg_type from xjssc_open_data group by substr(day,1,8)) b on a.day = b.day order by a.day desc

select
from xjssc_open_data where wx_type is null;
